abstract: Good arguments can be made, he said, both for or against the idea that the presidentâ€™s campaign to pressure Ukraine to investigate his political rivals rose to the level of an impeachable offense.
lead_paragraph: There was a familiar face in the gallery overlooking the Senate chamber on Tuesday: Jeff Flake, the former senator from Arizona who decided not to seek re-election in 2018 after concluding that there was no room in the Republican Party for a critic of President Trump.
